segments.text: I see the little girl reaching up for a cookie, and it’s so sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks like she’s been waiting for this moment all day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s trying to be patient while her brother gets the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool he’s standing on looks so unstable, but she doesn’t seem worried.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t fall and ruin their little cookie adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman drying dishes has no idea what’s happening right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the girl knows how much trouble they’ll be in if they get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is so innocent, but it’s also a little dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is going to be so excited when she finally gets that cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water on the floor is spreading, but she’s just focused on the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at how determined she looks.
segments.speaker: PAR
